title: April Wine - One For The Road [320k MP3]
description:
One for the Road is a live album by Canadian rock band April Wine, recorded during their "One More for the Road" tour in 1984 in support of their Animal Grace album.

Although this album has never been released on CD by itself, the entire performance can be found on disc 4 of the The April Wine Collection, which was reissued on Unidisc in 2008.
